summary: Major divergence areas: (1) instructions flattened in fork (original used core/meta); (2) standards shifted (Ruby/Rails → Python/FastAPI + modern JS/Tailwind, tabs vs spaces); (3) new hygiene-check command added; (4) claude-code agents enhanced with automatic delegation triggers and extended behaviors; (5) execute-tasks in fork emphasizes dynamic script execution and modular imports.

directories.name: claude-code

files.details: Adds Automatic Delegation Triggers and explicit usage conditions; clarifies selective reading and output format.
Adds Automatic Delegation Triggers; formalizes filesystem timestamp method and strict output format.
Adds Automatic Delegation Triggers; expands templates, constraints, and error handling.
Adds Automatic Delegation Triggers; expands workflow patterns, PR template, and constraints.
Adds Automatic Delegation Triggers; extends framework detection; prescribes concise failure reporting.

directories.special_notes: File set matches original agents, but fork versions introduce auto-delegation and expanded operational details.

directories.name: commands

files.details: Both reference @~/.agent-os/instructions/core/analyze-product.md
Reference path changed: original → core/create-spec.md; fork → instructions/create-spec.md
Reference path changed: original → core/execute-tasks.md; fork → instructions/execute-tasks.md
Reference path changed: original → core/plan-product.md; fork → instructions/plan-product.md
New command in fork to run workspace hygiene check.

directories.special_notes: Fork adds hygiene command and updates reference targets from core/* to flattened instructions/*.

directories.name: instructions

files.details: Fork adds mandatory execution acknowledgment, standards comparison with discrepancy report, and richer final summary.
Fork adds GitHub Issue requirement, date-checker integration, and folder naming with issue suffix (#123).
Fork emphasizes dynamic script execution (`!`), modular imports, and mandatory quality gates.
Fork expands process (e.g., startup scripts/env files, port config), templates, and enforcement details.
No standalone execute-task in fork repository; fork’s execute-tasks refers to @~/.agent-os/instructions/core/execute-task.md externally.
Not present in fork repo; still referenced externally by several instruction files.
New detailed hygiene instruction in fork with structured report/scoring.

directories.special_notes: Original used nested core/meta; fork flattens into top-level `instructions/*.md` and relies on external @~/.agent-os paths for some core/meta artifacts.

directories.name: standards

files.details: Fork adds GitHub Issue/PR workflow enforcement and task status rigor; original uses conditional blocks.
Fork shifts to tabs for indentation and adds modern Python/JS/React/Tailwind guidance; original prescribes 2 spaces and conditional fetch blocks.
Tech defaults changed: original Ruby/Rails/npm → fork Python/FastAPI, React 19, Yarn, Vite, Tailwind v4.
Not present in fork.
Not present in fork.
Not present in fork.

directories.special_notes: Standards significantly refocused: ecosystem defaults and formatting rules changed; original language-specific style files were removed.
